headline: Amazon overhauls Wondery podcast studio, cuts 110 jobs
summary: (Reuters) -Amazon.com is restructuring the Wondery podcast studio by shifting its award-winning narrative podcasts such as "Business Wars" to Audible and consolidating creator-led shows into a new unit, according to a memo seen by Reuters.  About 110 employees will be laid off as part of the process and many will transition to other parts of Amazon, the company said in an emailed statement on Monday.  Wondery CEO Jen Sargent will also depart the company following a transition period, the memo said.

raw.headline: Amazon overhauls Wondery podcast studio, cuts 110 jobs
raw.summary: (Reuters) -Amazon.com is restructuring the Wondery podcast studio by shifting its award-winning narrative podcasts such as "Business Wars" to Audible and consolidating creator-led shows into a new unit, according to a memo seen by Reuters.  About 110 employees will be laid off as part of the process and many will transition to other parts of Amazon, the company said in an emailed statement on Monday.  Wondery CEO Jen Sargent will also depart the company following a transition period, the memo said.

headline: Cash Windfall From Trump’s Tax Law Is Starting to Show Up at Big Companies
summary: The magnitude of the cash savings from this summer’s federal tax legislation is starting to take shape at America’s biggest companies.  AT&T  recently said it expected $1.5 billion to $2 billion in cash tax savings this year, due to provisions in the tax-and-spending law dubbed the One Big Beautiful Bill Act.  The high end of the range is equivalent to an 11% boost to analyst estimates of 2025 free cash flow before the law was enacted.

raw.headline: Cash Windfall From Trump’s Tax Law Is Starting to Show Up at Big Companies
raw.summary: The magnitude of the cash savings from this summer’s federal tax legislation is starting to take shape at America’s biggest companies.  AT&T  recently said it expected $1.5 billion to $2 billion in cash tax savings this year, due to provisions in the tax-and-spending law dubbed the One Big Beautiful Bill Act.  The high end of the range is equivalent to an 11% boost to analyst estimates of 2025 free cash flow before the law was enacted.
